channel.title: Graphics Driver Problem
channel.description:
I spent days looking for a working driver for my graphics card.
(Windows 7)
I finally found one in the Windows Update repository that worked.
I installed it sure enough, restarted Windows. Then... it happened. Every time I boot into Windows the driver tries to install itself all over again. Sometimes it fails, but usually succeeds.
[size=18pt]The Point:[/size]
Every time I reboot, it reinstalls the same driver.

item.title: Graphics Driver Problem
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

I’ve tried drivers from Dell, Intel itself, and any Google leads me into.

This is the first one to actually install successfully.

In case you may want the card specs, I’m on the right computer now.

Read full topic

Did you download it from the Microsoft website? ONLY download it from a trusted website or there is no point even trying.

(Lol should have read, you did well yeah try another one)
